nodes.text: The bloodflower was a type of flower native to Grella.
During the Cold War, the flower bloomed on Grella, marking the first time an individual had seen the flower bloom since the Great Hyperspace War.
A species of strange insects nested in the bloodflower's stem[source?].

Prior to Game Update 4.1 of Star Wars: The Old Republic, the Bioanalysis crew skill mission "The Bloodflowers" was only available to Imperial characters. Additionally, the mission text stated that the bloodflower grew on Korriban.
